attributes.action: Spend vehicle tax money on improving the quality of our roads
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Request that the government spend the billions of pounds paid through vehicle road tax on improving the quality of our roads.
Britains roads are getting in a very poor state with potholes and poor surfaces. Even motorways are getting large potholes appearing, which is very dangerous, and can cause tyre, steering linkage and wheel damage leading to accidents.
I have never seen our roads in such a poor state of repair.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
